proposal: Navigating the Plebocracy universe, it's clear you're reshaping the Pleb experience with innovation and fairness at the core. Congrats on crossing 101 holders on the ETH network! 🎉 Imagine enhancing this journey with your own DEX or engaging the community further through a blockchain lottery. Our tools are here to align with your vision, empowering every Pleb to not just participate but also deploy. Let's democratize the ecosystem together!
